headline: Bernstein Raises Dollar Tree Price Target Amid Strong Q1 Sales Beat
summary: Dollar Tree, Inc. (NASDAQ:DLTR) ranks among the best FMCG stocks to buy. Analysts from the Bernstein SocGen Group raised their price target for Dollar Tree, Inc. (NASDAQ:DLTR) from $82 to $86 while maintaining the stock at Market Perform. Although the analysts pointed to robust comparable sales, they also stated that tariffs are probably going to […]
